Name: Vanilla Daiquiri
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: A classic Natural Daiquiri with a hint of vanilla.
Nutrition: One serving of Vanilla Daiquiri contains 179 calories
